about.title: About TempMail
about.intro: TempMail provides free temporary email addresses to protect your privacy online.

sections.p: Empower users to maintain privacy with simple, fast, and secure disposable email addresses.
Create a temporary inbox instantly, receive emails, and dispose of it when done.
We do not require personal information to use TempMail. Emails in temporary inboxes may be processed to deliver messages and are automatically removed according to expiration settings.
We may use minimal cookies to ensure functionality (such as language preferences).
We implement reasonable safeguards, but temporary inboxes should not be used for sensitive information.
You agree not to use TempMail for illegal activities or to violate others' rights.
TempMail is provided as-is without warranties. Service availability and retention are not guaranteed.
To the extent permitted by law, TempMail shall not be liable for any damages arising from use of the service.

q1.a: Emails are kept as long as you continue to use your temporary email address. As soon as you close your temporary address, your emails will be deleted along with your temporary account.

q2.a: TempMail does not have any access to your temporary email. We don't store any of your personal information or any of the emails you receive.

q3.q: Where do I see if I've received an email?
q3.a: Emails you receive to your temporary mailbox will be displayed in the inbox located in your dashboard after logging in.

q4.q: How do I change the email address?
q4.a: You can create a new temporary email address by creating a new account with a different username or domain.

q5.a: No. Unfortunately when you delete the emails you sent or received with the used domain, they are gone for good. We do this so your privacy is protected and your deleted emails aren't left exposed.

q6.a: A temporary email is a disposable email address that is only valid for a brief time before being automatically destroyed. TempMail's Temporary Email is a free disposable email designed to keep your personal information private.
